name: dismember
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to cut, tear, or pull the arms and legs off the body of a dead person or animal: The police found the dismembered body of a young man in the murderer's freezer.
literary to divide a country or an empire into different parts: Some countries hoped to achieve statehood when the Ottoman Empire was dismembered.
